Comments_List: Maybe twenty minutes to half-an-hour researching guests.
None
1 hour
1hr

As I am obtaining a professional degree, this is definitely one of the most preparatory hours I spend for my degree. We learn from reputable industry professionals that are so kind to give us there time. Gives us a direct understanding of current HC issues and policies which we will encounter and hopefully help solve in the very near future.
I really enjoyed our colloquium speakers this past semester. They provided us with diverse perspectives on the healthcare field at the moment.
Fantastic. A wonderful opportunity.

Strength: great talks by fascinating guest lecturers

No apparent weakness.
Outstanding lecturers.
It's already amazing!
Really enjoyed this class. Great speakers
Fantastic

The speakers chosen for the colloquium are very engaging and experienced.  I feel that they each have lots of life lessons to share with the students regardless of their current field of expertise.  This course is unique to Yale, and I think that is a definite strength.

It would be helpful in the future to get an idea of what the speaker will be presenting on before the colloquium so students can do more research on the subject.
Love attending colloquium each week! The speakers are extremely interesting, and students enjoy hearing about their personal and professional journeys.
It was a very enjoyable course and was inspiring to hear from healthcare leaders.
Some really interesting speakers.
Colloquium is fantastic and the perspective gained from listening to the speakers is truly inspiring.
Amazing lecturers.

Strengths: Meet variety of healthcare speakers

Weaknesses: None

This is a fantastic course where leaders in healthcare share their personal as well as professional experiences. I have been humbled by hearing these highly accomplished individuals share their struggles, adversities and triumphs with their audience, from a human perspective. 

There was no pomp and show or a parading of their glory but rather a portrayal of determination and persistence in the presence of confusion and uncertainty. This was a common thread in all their stories, reaffirming the necessity for resilience, self-compassion and faith when pursuing one's dreams. 

This class should be entitled, 'Classes in Wisdom'. 

Highly recommended.
Extremely helpful and caring for students. Takes very strong initiative to prepare us for our careers.
Dr. Forman was always clear on what his expectations were and is always available to meet us briefly if needed.
Howie cares deeply about his students and is a fantastic instructor.
Always impressed by Howie's enthusiasm, wealth-of-knowledge, and insights.
Outstanding professor and mentor, excellent lecturer.
Dr. Forman is compassionate and inspiring. The best part of colloquium was getting the chance to hear him speak and listen to his life lessons.
Dr. Forman has created a course that is very formative for career development.
He's wonderful!
Great program run by dr. forman
Howie is fantastic
My only suggestion would be to set aside a fixed time for office hours.
Always cares deeply for his students and takes effort to make sure we get the most out of the talks/speakers.

I was really happy that a speaker canceled and he stepped in. His discussion was perhaps more educational and insightful than any of the other speakers. I would suggest that he include a session on his advice more or less every year. HCM students perhaps get that in other venues, but for HPM folks, that was unusual.
Excellent.

Howie is a titan - professionally as well as personally. 

He is a mentor and inspiration to all his students, and always find time to connect with them, provide advice and comfort, and share nuggets of wisdom. 

This mas has become a role model for me. Meeting an individual him has made my experience at Yale worth it. 

I feel privileged to have been taught by him.
Even if you are not enrolled, this is definitely a thursday night well spent. Especially if speaker has a background of your interest! I hope this continues for future generations.
I would recommend this course to anyone interested in the healthcare industry.
A weekly-evening guest lecture series from prominent members of the public health field.
Lectures re healthcare that are outstanding in a round table format.
Amazing course! I would highly recommend - it is great way to feel stimulated and reconnected with your purpose in the health care field.
Amazing

This course is a great way to learn from and network with professionals in healthcare.  Each speaker in the colloquium comes from a diverse background, so every session allows students to learn unique lessons pertaining to a career in the healthcare field.

Great course! For just one hour every week, you get to hear from some amazing speakers in health care, particularly those who are well-accomplished leaders in the field. It's a great learning experience!
It was a great privilege that we got to hear from influential speakers.
Life lessons. Seems superficial from time to time. But then there are these occasional speakers that are insightful and impactful.
Would absolutely recommend it. Gained excellent career and life advice from it.
Highly recommend for the exposure to all of the great presenters.
As above
